short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension help set tags on pictures onto Zerochan

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zero-tags â€“ google chrome extension for a quick tagging at zerochan.
 It will allow light and easy add most popular tags to pictures posted on zerochan. 
1)Just click on extension icon to show up list of tags.
2)Select tag(s) from list.
3)Tag appears at "Add tags" section.
4)Press "Add" at site page.
5)Done!
You can add tags on picture page or upload page. Tags will be comma-separated automatically. Enjoy!
